Litigious.definition: prone to engage in lawsuits or legal maneuvers esp. to an excessive degree [a stubbornly defendant] 2

1.definition: prone to engage in lawsuits or legal maneuvers esp. to an excessive degree [a stubbornly defendant]

2.definition: subject to litigation [acquired only a possible claim ", 95 So. 2d 843 (1957)"]

3.definition: of, relating to, or marked by litigation
